name: Smoke Frog
description: A celebration of the silent film era showcasing classics with live musical accompaniment.

name: Dinosaurs
description: An electrifying event where local rock bands compete against each other for the title of the best band.

name: Eagle Fire
description: A unique event where top chefs display their culinary skills and create edible masterpieces.

name: Fire Piano
description: Learn the art of improvisation in this interactive and fun-filled workshop.

name: Mermaid
description: A must-visit for music lovers offering a wide range of vintage vinyl records.
